snippet.title: Welcome to Brew Town
snippet.description:
Every Brew Town game is different. 
We allow every player to make it their own, through custom recipes and label designs.

We’ve spent a year designing, testing and then redesigning, getting everything right. 

We’re pretty pleased with it. 

We’ve got 100 Beta test invites to give away! Want to be one of the lucky few who get to play Brew Town before it’s launch? Drop your email in below and we’ll be in touch very soon…

www.brewtowngame.com
